file_manage module¶

Batch deal with your files.

file_manage.batch_delete_file(input_dir, file_limit)¶

Batch delete certatin files in a folder.

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – a dir_list.txt file save the directory of the folders to be named

  • file_limit (list) – a list of certain extension of file, or the filename

file_manage.batch_delete_folder(input_dir, sub_folder=False)¶

Batch delete folders. Or specify a sub_folder to be deleted

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – a dir_list.txt file save the directory of the folders to be named

  • sub_folder (list) – default is False not for subfolder. Giving a list of subfolders to only delete the subfolders

file_manage.batch_rename_file(input_dir, file_extension, re_match, str_new)¶

Change the the name of files with certain extension it do same as using e.g. re.sub(‘-v([0-9]*)’ ,’-v800’, path)

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – a dir_list.txt file save the directory of the folders containing the certain files

  • file_extension (list) – a list of certain extension of file

  • re_match (string) – regular express to locate the string to be changed.

  • str_new (string) – new string to change the string in the old folders name

file_manage.batch_rename_folder(input_dir, re_match, str_new)¶

Change the folder name using regular expression. it do same as using e.g. re.sub(‘-v([0-9]*)’ ,’-v800’, path)

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – a dir.txt file save the directory of the folders to be named

  • re_match (string) – regular express to locate the string to be changed.

  • str_new (string) – new string to change the string in the old folders name

file_manage.copy_filter(input_dir, output_dir, include_file_type)¶

Copy files with certain extensions using bash command: rsync Default setting is to copy todo: add exclude type

Parameters

input_dir (string) – the directory of the folder that original files in, end with /

e.g. /root/mnt/WF/Joost_shared/ /root/mnt/To-laptop/Joost_shared/

Parameters

  • output_dir (string) – the directory of the folder that target files to be moved in

  • include_file_type (tuple) – a tuple of the extenstion of files to be moved

file_manage.dir_list(input_dir, output_path, only_folder=True, certain_file=False)¶

Create a dir_list.txt (you shold name this in the output_path) for the subfolders and/or files in a folder.

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – the directory of the folder that subfolders or files in

  • output_dir (string) – the directory of a file which contains the directorids. e.g. XXX/XXX.dir_list.txt

  • only_folder (boolean) – True-only export the subfolder directory.

  • certain_file (str) – default is False to include all files/folder. Specify a file name or extains as a filter.

file_manage.folder_tree(input_dir, folder_names)¶

Create subfolders based on a give list of folder names.

Parameters

  • input_dir (string) – the directory of the folder that subfolders or files in

  • folder_names (list) – a list of strings to store the names of desired subfolders.
